titleStmt.title: The unfortunate bride, or, The Blind lady a beauty a novel / by Mrs. A. Behn.
titleStmt.author: Behn, Aphra, 1640-1689.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for S.B. and sold by the booksellers of London and Westminster,

notesStmt.note: Added t.p. on p. [5] : The unfortunate bride, or, the blind lady a beauty : a novel / by Mrs. A. Behn. - London : Printed for Sauel Briscoe ..., 1698.
Page 8 misnumbered as 9. Numbers 14 and 15 are repeated in pagination.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
